achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Blessed Hamada

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Blessed Hamada

achievements.name: Dune Guide

achievements.desc: Follow 16 Seelie in Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert to their Seelie Courts.
